CustomField.formula:
IF(
DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) < TODAY()-365 && IsClosed = true && (DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate) < TODAY()-90 || (LastModifiedById = "0051G000006IsUi" || LastModifiedById = "0051G0000069ZB1" || LastModifiedById = "0051G0000069uOp")),
true, false)
CustomField.label: Eligible for Archive
